name: EMPTY
explanation: Can be used as an eraser.

name: HOOKABLE
explanation: It's possible to hook and collide with it.

name: KILL
explanation: Kills the tee.

name: UNHOOKABLE
explanation:
It's not possible to hook it,
but can collide with it.

name: LASER BLOCKER
explanation: Doesn't let DRAGGING & SPINNING LASER and PLASMA TURRET reach tees through it.

name: HOOKTHROUGH
explanation: Only hook can go through it.

name: OLD HOOKTHROUGH
explanation: Deprecated. Combined with (UN)HOOKABLE tiles, allows to hook through the walls.

name: JUMP
explanation: Sets defined amount of jumps (default is 2).

name: FREEZE
explanation: Freezes tees for defined amount of seconds.

name: WALLJUMP
explanation:
Placed next to a wall.
Enables to climb up the wall.

name: WALLJUMP
explanation: Enables to climb up the wall.

name: SPEEDUP
explanation:
Gives tee defined speed.
Arrow shows direction and angle.

name: REFILL JUMPS
explanation: Restores all jumps.

name: START
explanation: Starts counting your race time.

name: FINISH
explanation: End of race.

name: TUNE ZONE
explanation: Area, where defined tunes work.

name: PENALTY
explanation:
__Adds__ time to your current race time.
Opposite of BONUS.

name: BONUS
explanation:
__Subtracts__ time from your current race time.
Opposite of PENALTY.

name: CREDITS
explanation: Who designed the entities.

name: ENTITIES OFF SIGN
explanation: Informs people playing with entities about important marks, tips, information, or text on the map. Players should turn entities off to see the note before continuing the race.

name: SHIELD
explanation: Takes all weapons (except hammer and pistol) away.

name: SHIELD
explanation: Takes all weapons (except hammer and pistol) away.

name: HEART
explanation:
Works like a FREEZE tile.
Freezes tees for 3 seconds by default.

name: HEART
explanation:
Works like a FREEZE tile.
Freezes tees for 3 seconds by default.

name: DOOR
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH will create doors.
Doesn't allow to go through it (only with NINJA).

name: DOOR
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH will create doors.
Doesn't allow to go through it (only with NINJA).

name: DOOR
explanation: Doesn't allow to go through it (only with NINJA).

name: JETPACK
explanation: You __lost__ your jetpack gun.

name: JETPACK
explanation: You __have__ a jetpack gun.

name: EVIL TELEPORT
explanation:
After falling into this tile, tees appear
on TO with the same number.
Speed and hook are __deleted__.

name: WEAPON TELEPORT
explanation:
Teleports __bullets__ shot into it to
TELEPORT TO, where it comes out.
Direction, angle and length are kept.

name: HOOK TELEPORT
explanation:
Teleports __hooks__ entered into it to
TELEPORT TO, where it comes out.
Direction, angle and length are kept.

name: TELEPORT
explanation:
After falling into this tile, tees appear on TO with the same number.
Speed and hook are __kept__.

name: TELEPORT
explanation: Teleport destination tile for FROMs, WEAPON & HOOK TELEPORTs with the same numbers.

name: TELEPORT CHECKPOINT
explanation: After having touched this tile, any CFRM will teleport you to CTO with the same number.

name: CHECKPOINT TELEPORT
explanation: Here tees will appear after touching TELEPORT CHECKPOINT with the same number and falling into CFROM TELEPORT.

name: CHECKPOINT TELEPORT
explanation:
Sends tees to CTO with the same number as the last touched TELEPORT CHECKPOINT.
Speed and hook are __kept__.

name: CHECKPOINT EVIL TELE
explanation:
Sends tees to CTO with the same number as the last touched TELEPORT CHECKPOINT.
Speed and hook are __deleted__.

name: LASER LENGTH
explanation: Combined with DOOR or SPINNING LASER, makes it __3__ tiles long.

name: LASER LENGTH
explanation: Combined with DOOR or SPINNING LASER, makes it __6__ tiles long.

name: LASER LENGTH
explanation: Combined with DOOR or SPINNING LASER, makes it __9__ tiles long.

name: OLD LASER
explanation:
Shotgun drags others always towards the shooter, even after having bounced.
Shooter can't hit himself.
Place only one tile somewhere on the map.

name: OLD LASER
explanation:
Shotgun drags others always towards the shooter, even after having bounced.
Shooter can't hit himself.

name: COLLISION OFF
explanation:
Nobody can collide with others.
Place only one tile somewhere on the map.

name: COLLISION OFF
explanation: Nobody can collide with others.

name: ENDLESS HOOK ON
explanation:
Everyone has endless hook.
Place only one tile somewhere on the map.

name: ENDLESS HOOK ON
explanation: Everyone has endless hook.

name: HIT OTHERS OFF
explanation:
Nobody can hit others.
Place only one tile somewhere on the map.

name: HIT OTHERS OFF
explanation: Nobody can hit others.

name: HOOK OTHERS OFF
explanation:
Nobody can hook others.
Place only one tile somewhere on the map.

name: HOOK OTHERS OFF
explanation: Nobody can hook others.

name: UNLOCK TEAM
explanation: Unlocks the team, used on dummy maps.

name: SPEEDER
explanation: Causes weapons, SHIELD, HEART and SPINNING LASER to move.

name: SPEEDER
explanation: Causes weapons, SHIELD, HEART and SPINNING LASER to move.

name: SPEEDER
explanation: Causes weapons, SHIELD, HEART and SPINNING LASER to move.

name: SPEEDER
explanation: Causes weapons, SHIELD, HEART and SPINNING LASER to move.

name: HOOK BLOCK
explanation: Blocks only the hook from going through.

name: HOOK BLOCK SIDE
explanation: Blocks only the hook from going through from one side.

name: SOLO
explanation: You are now __in__ a solo part.

name: SOLO
explanation: You are now __out__ of the solo part.

name: HIT OTHERS
explanation: You __can__ hit others.

name: HIT OTHERS
explanation: You can __activate__ hitting others for single weapons.

name: HIT OTHERS
explanation: You __can't__ hit others.

name: HIT OTHERS
explanation: You can __deactivate__ hitting others for single weapons.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to lengthen and shorten constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to lengthen and shorten constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to lengthen and shorten constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to shorten and lengthen constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to shorten and lengthen constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: LASER LENGTH CHANGE
explanation:
Combined with LASER LENGTH, causes it to shorten and lengthen constantly.
 Works only on (NON-)SPINNING LASER, not on DOOR.

name: SUPER JUMP
explanation: You __don't have__ unlimited air jumps.

name: SUPER JUMP
explanation: You __have__ unlimited air jumps.

name: DEEP FREEZE
explanation:
Permanent freeze.
Only UNDEEP tile can
cancel this effect.

name: DEEP FREEZE
explanation:
Permanent freeze.
Only UNDEEP tile can
cancel this effect.

name: UNDEEP
explanation: Removes DEEP FREEZE effect.

name: UNDEEP
explanation: Removes DEEP FREEZE effect.

name: ENDLESS HOOK
explanation: Endless hook has been __activated__.

name: ENDLESS HOOK
explanation: Endless hook has been __deactivated__.

name: FLAG
explanation:
**Not used in DDRace**
Place where __red__ team flag is.

name: FLAG
explanation:
**Not used in DDRace**
Place where __blue__ team flag is.

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation:
Shoots plasma bullets at the closest tee.
They explode on an obstacle they hit (wall or tee).

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation:
Shoots plasma bullets at the closest tee.
They explode on an obstacle they hit (wall or tee).

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation: Shoots plasma bullets that work like FREEZE at the closest tee.

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation: Shoots plasma bullets that work like FREEZE at the closest tee.

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation:
Shoots plasma bullets that work like FREEZE at the closest tee.
They also explode on an obstacle they hit (wall or tee).

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation:
Shoots plasma bullets that work like FREEZE at the closest tee.
They also explode on an obstacle they hit (wall or tee).

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation: Shoots plasma bullets that work like UNFREEZE at the closest tee.

name: PLASMA TURRET
explanation: Shoots plasma bullets that work like UNFREEZE at the closest tee.

name: STOPPER
explanation:
You can hook and shoot through it.
You can't go through it against the arrow.

name: STOPPER
explanation:
You can hook and shoot through it.
You can't go through it against the arrow.

name: STOPPER
explanation:
You can hook and shoot through it.
You can't go through it against the arrows.

name: STOPPER
explanation:
You can hook and shoot through it.
You can't go through it against the arrows.

name: STOPPER
explanation:
You can hook and shoot through it.
You can't go through it.

name: TELEGUN PISTOL ON
explanation: Enables telegun on the pistol.

name: TELEGUN PISTOL OFF
explanation: Disables telegun on the grenade.

name: TELEGUN TARGET WITHOUT MOMENTUM
explanation: Combined with a collision tile, if a projectile touches it you are teleported, but don't keep momentum. In the case of laser enables the teleport at the end of the beam. If used on the switch layer, use the delay value to enable only for 1 weapon: 0 - All, 1 - Piston, 2 - Grenade, 3 - Laser

name: TELEGUN TARGET WITH MOMENTUM
explanation: Combined with a collision tile, if a projectile touches it you are teleported and you keep momentum. In the case of laser enables the teleport at the end of the beam. If used on the switch layer, use the delay value to enable only for 1 weapon: 0 - All, 1 - Piston, 2 - Grenade, 3 - Laser

name: TELEGUN GRENADE ON
explanation: Enables telegun on the grenade.

name: TELEGUN GRENADE OFF
explanation: Disables telegun on the grenade.

name: TELEGUN LASER ON
explanation: Enables telegun on the laser.

name: TELEGUN LASER OFF
explanation: Disables telegun on the laser.

name: EXPLODING BULLET
explanation:
Bounces off the walls __with__ explosion.
Touching the bullet works like FREEZE tile (freezes for 3 seconds by default).

name: EXPLODING BULLET
explanation:
Bounces off the walls __with__ explosion.
Touching the bullet works like FREEZE tile (freezes for 3 seconds by default).

name: EXPLODING BULLET
explanation:
Bounces off the walls __with__ explosion.

name: BULLET
explanation:
Bounces off the walls __without__ explosion.

name: BULLET
explanation:

name: BULLET
explanation:

name: SHOTGUN
explanation:
Drags the tees towards it.
Bounces off the walls.

name: SHOTGUN
explanation:
Drags the tees towards it.
Bounces off the walls.

name: GRENADE LAUNCHER
explanation: Throws exploding bullets.

name: GRENADE LAUNCHER
explanation: Throws exploding bullets.

name: NINJA
explanation: Makes you being invisible in darkest nights :)

name: NINJA
explanation: Makes you being invisible in darkest nights :)

name: RIFLE
explanation:
Unfreezes the tees.
Bounces off the walls.

name: RIFLE
explanation:

explanation: Tile, where freezing laser (made with LASER LENGTH) begins.

explanation:
Grabs and attracts the closest tee to it.
